app_descript:
IPTV Extreme

Brief: IPTV Extreme delivers a comprehensive suite of features that allow users to watch TV through internet protocol television (IPTV) with various user-friendly functionalities and customization options. It supports streaming, recording, and on-demand content, with extras like Chromecast support and parental controls.
